Screenwriter: Phil Hay, Matt Manfredi, Michael J. Wilson, Michael J. Wilson, Michael Leeson
Production Co: DreamWorks SKG, Vanguard Films Production, Blue Train Productions
Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: Cabbie-turned-chauffeur Jimmy Tong (Jackie Chan) learns there is really only one rule when you work for playboy millionaire Clark Devlin (Jason Isaacs) : Never touch Devlin's prized tuxedo. But when Devlin is temporarily put out of commission in an explosive accident, Jimmy puts on the tux and soon discovers that this extraordinary suit may be more black belt than black tie. Paired with a partner (Jennifer Love Hewitt) as inexperienced as he is, Jimmy becomes an unwitting secret agent.
Title: The Tuxedo
